knowledge.question: What is printed for the above code?
explanation: Incorrect: in order to print the contents (10) the pointer would have to be dereferenced: *c
Correct: c is defined as a pointer and is being assigned the address of a in line 2, when the c pointer is printed it prints the address of a
Incorrect: in order to print the address of c, it needs to be prepended with an ampersand:  &c
